books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.description: A novel about justice and compassion in the Deep South.

books.author: George Orwell
books.description: A dystopian novel set in a totalitarian society.

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.description: A romantic novel set in early 19th-century England.

books.title: The Diary of a Young Girl
books.author: Anne Frank
books.description: A deeply moving and unforgettable portrait of an ordinary and yet an extraordinary teenage girl.

books.title: The Catcher in the Rye
books.author: J.D. Salinger
books.description: A timeless coming-of-age novel that follows the disillusioned teenager Holden Caulfield as he navigates the challenges of adolescence and society.

books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.description: An iconic novel set in the Jazz Age, exploring themes of wealth, love, and the American Dream through the enigmatic Jay Gatsby and narrator Nick Carraway.
